title: PANDEMO 350 Mountain E-Bike
text: Well established on the South African market, we proudly offer the Pandemo 350 mountain e-bike. Its great features include 6 different assistance settings, supplied by a powerful 350-watt motor housed in the rear wheel hub, and driven through Shimano 21-speed gear set system. A bright LED light and illuminated LCD screen facilitates night cycling. The electronic system provides essential cumulative and trip data including speed, distance, time, battery condition and instantaneous power consumption.Great handling characteristics: Improved steering is achieved through a 680mm handlebar, and you’ll always feel safe on these great bikes knowing that Tektro 160 front and rear disks are fitted!Value for money: The standard accessories included are a removable 36v long-lasting battery, bike kickstand, reflectors, bottle cradle, a USB charging port for your mobile device, and spring loaded throttle switch.It is available in 3 different sizes to suit all cyclists, male or female. Great e-bikes and scooters from SA Ebikes. Call Kobus at 0764245136 or visit our website at www.saebikes.co.za for more information, and to place your order now!We deliver countrywide.Chubby bag and waterbottle excluded.

title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: Urbanlite e-ride adjustable helmet
text: Product description Rekd protection Urbanlite E-RideREKD have taken their Urbanlite helmet to the max with Urbanlite E-ride. Certified to NTA 8776, a safety standard designed especially for S-EPAC / E-bike riders, Urbanlite E-ride helmet is there to keep you safe whether you’re commuting to work or just out for a ride on your E-bike.- Urbanlite E-Ride is packed with premium features such as a FIDLOCK® magnetic buckle, allowing for super easy and stylish fastening, as well as their heat-stamped anti-bacterial padding and Twist-Fit Retention System to help you find the perfect fit. With safety-enhancing features such as a battery light with solid and flashing settings as the adjuster dial, as well as stickers and logos and reflective strips inside the straps, helping you become more visible to other road users in low light situations, Urbanlite E-ride is the ultimate Urban focussed helmet with E-bikes and road safety in mind.Features:- Heat stamped anti-bacterial lined padding- Reflective front and rear logos- Custom branded REKD Protection strap dividers- Light-up Twist-Fit Retention System for the perfect fit- 12 vent holes for optimum airflow- Built-in weather peak- FIDLOCK® magnetic buckle- Additional reflective stickers included- Certified for use with e-bikes- Suitable for a wide range of action sportsSpecifications:Construction and Materials:- High-density Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) inner core- Durable Polycarbonate (PC) outer shell- Hardwearing Nylon webbing strap with Nylon buckle- Anti-bacterial lined padding- Product Weight: 325gAt this moment, the product Rekd protection Urbanlite E-Ride is in stock at xtremeinn. title: DHB Southsea Mountain Bike Jacket
text: DHB Southsea Mountain Biking JacketTechnical clothing with an urban appeal is becoming more and more common these days in the cycling fraternity. This excellent jacket from DHB could be a high street fashion jacket at a glance, but is a full-featured technical waterproof.The waterproof polyester fabric has a soft brushed twill effect coating on the outside, and full taped seams internally. The high neck is cut close to keep out drafts and rain, and it has a soft lining with a twin popper closure. Long tapered arms with Velcro adjustable cuffs are great for even the tallest riders, and the long dropped-tail keeps the worst of the weather away, without looking too much like a cycling garment.Two expandable pockets with popper flaps can hold a fair amount and their kidney positioning puts the weight in a good place with easy access, even while riding. One of the pockets has an internal zipped pocket that’s ideal for a phone or iPod.The cut is very good and the Southsea jacket is 100 percent waterproof. For commuting and casual riding it’s a brilliant choice.  Brand -: DHBDraw Chord Waistband -: YesSeam Sealed -: YesBreathable -: YesSize -: LargeThis jacket is used but in excellent overall condition & has been well looked after having only been used in earnest half a dozen or so times. It is a size large & would suit someone with around a 40" chest size (see size chart for details).Item can be posted/shipped tracked via PostNet if required.Please contact via WhatsApp for any questions or queries relating to this item.Thanks for looking...

title: Ryder Bora 2.0 UK8 + MTB Shimano Pedals + Cleates
text:
Retails for R1800 at Cyclelab.  You can get it for half price with a free set of used MTB Pedals.

The Ryder Bora 2.0 MTB Cycling Shoe offers the comfort and quick adjustment provided by a A-Top dial. With a single dial and a set-and-forget front strap, it should be convenient for the rider to be able to slip on this shoe and hit the trails. The A-top dial offers 1mm adjustment increments when tightening with macro release function. The co-moulded nylon and rubber lugged outsole provides high traction and durability to this shoe, ensuring that it will be suitable for varying terrains.

Features:

- Rigid MTB sole to protect the rider and increase power transfer from the rider to the pedals
- A-top fastening system for an adjustable, custom fit
- Breathable mesh to keep the rider cool
- Rubber non-slip heel lining to increase the stability of the rider

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: Moustache Samedi 27 Race 9 Carbon E-MTB For Sale
text: Moustache’s main aim when developing the Samedi 27 Race 9 was to permanently plaster a wicked grin on the rider’s face. As such, the carbon-framed beauty is a devilishly fun bike to ride. The Samedi 27 Race 9 comes sporting a super-clean look, with a fully integrated Bosch battery and cover. The brand’s love for detail is evident through the frame’s aesthetics, the all-round top spec, and Moustache’s in-house, purpose-built asymmetrical rims. Read a review on this bike here.> Hours: +/- 60hrs. This bike is mint and well maintained. It was serviced at Chris Willemse where I bought it new. > Year: 2018> Frame: JUST_Carbon technology, Aluminium Rear Triangle - Hollow alloy/carbon link - 160 mm travel> Fork: Fox 36 Float Performance - 160mm travel> Rear shock: MOUSTACHE Air Shock - 2-position Platform, Dynamic control of rebound, Grip Control> Motor: BOSCH Performance CX 250W - 40/75 Nm - Assistance from 40 to 300%> Battery: BOSCH Li ION PowerPack 500 integrated - 36v 13,8Ah> Charger: Bosch 4Ah> Display: BOSCH Purion display - 5 modes (Eco, Tour, eMTB, Turbo, Off) -  Walk assist > Rear derailleur: Shimano XT 11 speed> Shifters: Shimano Rapidfire 11S> Crankset: Exclusive Moustache forged alloy reinforced> Brakes: Formula Cura hydraulic disk brakes, powerful, enduring and progressive> Rotors Front/Rear (in mm): 203/180> Hubs: Moustache CNC Aluminium with annular bearings> Rims: Moustache JUST carbon exclusive 27.5" wheels - 35mm wide - Asymmetrical - tubeless> Tires: MAXXIS Tubeless Ready - Double density - Exo protection> Saddle: Moustache ergonomic - Anti-slip material> Seatpost: Moustache dropper seatpost with integrated cartridge> Handlebar: Moustache JUST Carbon T700 - 760 mm> Stem: 3D Forged aluminium - 50mm> Headset> Pedals: Moustache alloy, wide platform, anti-slip> Warranty: 5 years frame - 2 years fork, motor, battery (or 500 cycles) and accessories> Size: M/44 (1,68 to 1,85 m) approximately > Color: Turquoise/carbon> Weight: 21,5 kgPrice: R54,900 (which is half the price of what it sold for in 2018). title: PANDEMO 350 Mountain E-Bike
text: Well established on the South African market, we proudly offer the Pandemo 350 mountain e-bike. Its great features include 6 different assistance settings, supplied by a powerful 350-watt motor housed in the rear wheel hub, and driven through Shimano 21-speed gear set system. A bright LED light and illuminated LCD screen facilitates night cycling. The electronic system provides essential cumulative and trip data including speed, distance, time, battery condition and instantaneous power consumption.Great handling characteristics: Improved steering is achieved through a 680mm handlebar, and you’ll always feel safe on these great bikes knowing that Tektro 160 front and rear disks are fitted!Value for money: The standard accessories included are a removable 36v long-lasting battery, bike kickstand, reflectors, bottle cradle, a USB charging port for your mobile device, and spring loaded throttle switch.It is available in 3 different sizes to suit all cyclists, male or female. Great e-bikes and scooters from SA Ebikes. Call Kobus at 0764245136 or visit our website at www.saebikes.co.za for more information, and to place your order now!We deliver countrywide.Chubby bag and waterbottle excluded.
